SELECT T1."shikibetsuCode" AS "識別コード", T1."idoJiyuCode" AS "異動事由コード", T1."tekiyoYMD" AS "適用年月日", T1."tekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "適用届出年月日", T1."kaijoYMD" AS "解除年月日", T1."kaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "解除届出年月日", T1."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "論理削除フラグ", T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "更新日時", A."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "入所施設コード", A."nyushoYMD" AS "入所年月日", A."taishoYMD" AS "退所年月日" FROM rgdb."DbT1003TashichosonJushochiTokurei" AS T1 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" AS A ON T1."shikibetsuCode" = A."shikibetsuCode" AND A."daichoShubetsu" = '2' WHERE #{konkaiKaishi} <= T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= #{konkaiShuryo} AND T1."idoJiyuCode" IN (SELECT "code" FROM rgdb."UzT0007Code" WHERE "UzT0007Code"."subGyomuCode" ='DBA' AND "UzT0007Code"."codeShubetsu"='0008') AND T1."insertTimestamp" = A."insertTimestamp" ORDER BY T1."shikibetsuCode" DESC

SELECT T1."shikibetsuCode" AS "識別コード", T1."idoJiyuCode" AS "異動事由コード", T1."tekiyoYMD" AS "適用年月日", T1."tekiyoTodokedeYMD" AS "適用届出年月日", T1."kaijoYMD" AS "解除年月日", T1."kaijoTodokedeYMD" AS "解除届出年月日", T1."logicalDeletedFlag" AS "論理削除フラグ", T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AS "更新日時", A."nyushoShisetsuCode" AS "入所施設コード", A."nyushoYMD" AS "入所年月日", A."taishoYMD" AS "退所年月日" FROM rgdb."DbT1003TashichosonJushochiTokurei" T1 LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT1004ShisetsuNyutaisho" A ON T1."shikibetsuCode" = A."shikibetsuCode" AND A."daichoShubetsu" = '2' WHERE #{konkaiKaishi} <= T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" AND T1."lastUpdateTimestamp" <= #{konkaiShuryo} AND T1."idoJiyuCode" IN (SELECT "code" FROM rgdb."UzT0007Code" WHERE "UzT0007Code"."subGyomuCode" ='DBA' AND "UzT0007Code"."codeShubetsu"='0011') ORDER BY T1."shikibetsuCode" DESC
